summary: Adds thematic music to Redwater Den, a skooma den added as part of the Dawnguard DLC.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds thematic music to the Redwater Den location that is added as a part of the Dawnguard DLC.  The place is a skooma den, and I felt that an opportunity was missed here to add some music that would enhance the mood, so I went ahead and made some and made a mod to implement the music.

This is original music by yours truly.  I am a composer and I can assure you that I tried to make the music that I thought was of good quality and fits well within the world of the game.  Enjoy!

-- -- -- -- Listen First -- -- -- --

You can listen to the track on YouTube in the video section of this mod or by visiting this link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIXe09hQAvs

You can also listen on my SoundCloud page by visiting this link:

http://soundcloud.com/delaric/skyrim-redwater-den

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- 

===

TO INSTALL--
Extract the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\\Data\\ folder.  If you extract to the Skyrim main folder, the mod will not work.

===

What this mod does to the game:
Adds one Music Track
Adds one Music Type (which contains the music track)
Changes the Music Type of the Redwater Den interior cell to my custom Music Type

*Note : If you have a game saved in Redwater Den before you install this mod, you may have to load your saved game, exit and re-enter Redwater Den for the mod to take effect.
____________________________________________________________________________________
You can find this and other upcoming Skyrim music, as well as lots of other music I have written, on my Soundcloud page: http://soundcloud.com/delaric
author: Delaric
